posts.author: KobeissiLetter

posts.text:
Chatting with a good friend this morning and top trader.  We were speculating on how unprecedented the stock chart and vol will be for $hg $hgraf cause it’s such an unprecedented story. 

I gave the same example of how I hear of people that got in early selling to take profits simply because it’s gone up so much and they expect the opportunity to buy in later on a dip.  

But when you query them about valuation they don’t have a clue how potentially cheap the stock is .. with some pro brokers telling me ‘if they get 5000 tonnes of orders it will be $50bln company”. 

Along with this constant struggle of people taking profits and hoping to get back in… the stock will keep shifting to new hands. Stronger hands… that are buying at $6-7 cause they think it’s going to $50 or $100.  

Meanwhile undoubtedly there will be hedge funds and speculators trying to short it.  Huge fuel to surge the stock as the achieve milestone. Partnerships, orders, more patents. Etc  

Finally. Next to no institutional ownership and no index funds yet.  Both will come.  

Unprecedented moves ahead.  Know what you own or get left behind. 

Eric Sprott taught me to have these convos daily with yourself. Reminding me why I own it a where I think it’s going.  

It’s so difficult to get a 100x return.  We just keep are eye on the prize and understand the significance of it each press release and data point from interviews so we can make the best risk reward decisions
posts.author: BambroughKevin
